oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Comparison of NIRS based methods to determine legume content of mixed swards
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nykänen, A.
Heuwinkel, H.
Loges, R.
Locher, F.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pasture and forage crops
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Four established and two new NIRS calibrations for the determination of legume content in dry ground mixtures were used to estimate clover content in ten Finnish red clover-grass mixtures of known legume content.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Nykänen, A.; Heuwinkel, H.; Loges, R. and Locher, F. (2004) Comparison of NIRS based methods to determine legume content of mixed swards. In: COST-852 Quality legume-based forage systems for contrasting environments, p. 39.
